<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_545192_badgeoffi_badgerequesttask</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>ExtractImageDatatoBase64String</name><order>1</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	gs.info('BusinessRule is called get Image data in base64');
	gs.info(current.sys_id);
	current.testcol ='somestring';

	gs.info('updated testcol');
	var attachment = new GlideSysAttachment();
    var agr = attachment.getAttachments('x_545192_badgeoffi_badgerequesttask', current.sys_id);
	
	gs.info(agr);
	while(agr.next())
		gs.info('agr');
		gs.info(agr.getValue('file_name'));
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-04 11:39:17</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>38598011db986410a529487039961920</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ExtractImageDatatoBase64String</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BadgeOfficer" source="x_545192_badgeoffi">84a1c00ddb9c2410a52948703996198c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BadgeOfficer">84a1c00ddb9c2410a52948703996198c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_38598011db986410a529487039961920</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-11-04 12:29:32</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=38598011db986410a529487039961920"/></record_update>
